The Boeing Company, together with its subsidiaries, is one of the world’s major aerospace firms . We operate in three reportable segments: Commercial Airplanes (BCA); Defense, Space & Security (BDS) and Global Services (BGS) Boeing is organized based on the products and services we offer .
 Boeing’s total workforce was approximately 172,000 with 15% located outside of the U.S. Boeing owns numerous patents and has licenses for the use of patents owned by others . Unpatented research, development and engineering skills, as well as certain trademarks, trade secrets and other intellectual property rights, also make an important contribution to our business .
 As of December 31, 2024, our workforce included approximately 58,000 union members . 24% women, and our U.S. workforce was comprised of 39% racial and ethnic minorities . We have two major agreements with the International Association of Machinists and Aerospace Workers (IAM) and the Society of Professional Engineering Employees in Aerospace (SPEEA)
